summary: A better looking less obvious sneak.
descriptionHtml:
Replaced the original sneak with the female walk "because its more finese"
Replaced the power attack animation with a stabby one for 1 handed which looks alot better for stealth.
If you want just stabby only keep the power attack file in animations.
Gives male charecters a very sexy clipping sneak walk. :D
I would suggest getting a [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=175411700&searchtext=]sneak comment remover mod[/url].
Enjoy.
author: thelawfull
